attributes.action: Remove west Kent from Tier 3 restrictions
attributes.additional_details: To prevent thousands of businesses from being needlessly closed at this critical time
attributes.background: The Government is poised to put much of Kent needlessly into Tier 3.   This should be reviewed, based upon the local Covid cases data that is available

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562004
